response.overview: Each of which has its own “Far East”, someone has a hundred-year-old Japanese lighthouse, someone has the old streets of Vladivostok, someone has memories of their ancestors that never leave them, who ended up in the Far East by the will of fate, and someone has temple in a small village on the Kamchatka peninsula. Each of them feels anxiety about the fate of their small homeland, which is going through a difficult moment in its history. At the same time, all these people live with a sense of the possibility of a new life for their region, their country.
response.title: Close Dalny. A Premonition of Fate
